title: Old karma?
body: Is there any way we can get Old karma back? ive seen some pretty negative reviews about wanting old karma on her old spotlight. I myself am seriously missing old karma so much I would like a fan user type weapon champion in the game like Old Karma. Not that the new karma is bad, just missing old champions! {{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body:
I too miss her, but we gotta be realistic:

**Old Karma is gone.** Like, literally, they don't have her data anymore.
And even if they did, inserting it into today's game would just lead to a few hundred error messages and bugs. She would need a ton of changes anyways, because her old kit - in terms of gameplay - wouldn't work either. It was really rich in ideas and suprisingly deep, but it just doesn't fit today's design standards...

The best we can hope for is that in her upcoming small rework Karma gets back a bit of her old self, like a bait passive, duality-mantras, shieldbomb, a creative tether,
and maybe one day we get an awesome new champ with fanweapons.
should we even give up on the fans ? implementing them in her design is not really a tough thing though, she already got them in her robes so the model is ready and fine

The point of a fanwielding champion is to use them in their abilities as well.
Just tacking them onto their character model is a waste of a weapon,
both visually and in terms of gameplay.

She would need abilities that actually feel like using fanweapons,
like blocking sight, dancing around, deflecing missiles, being deceptive.

One could argue that old Karma did this.
She had the duality aspect of fanweapons, 
that can both block and hurt,
her passive was deceptive,
her basic spell had the SHAPE of a fan, but...

her rework tried to realize the other parts of her,
the enlightened part, the shieldbomb, the mantra, etc,
and ditched the fanweapons to NEARLY include a visual identity focused on twindragons, whirling around her arms and being part of all her spells. If you look closely you can see the slight shadow of circling serpents on her Q, for example. But it hasn't been fleshed out at all...

So long story short:
Yeah. Current Karma went for twindragons, spiritual energy and enlightenment.
Adding fanweapons would not ADD to this character, but take away from it.
And block any future champion from using them.
Agreed, but even the new concept in not well depiced and everyone knows this already, i just hope they take these things into consideration

I have a lot of faith in NeuroCat. She seems like a genuine Karma fan with an honest commitment towards pleasing and working WITH the community. Even if the endresult won't be perfect (nothing ever is), at least, for the first time in 5 years, I feel like there is someone _trying_ to make her better and to give this champion the love she deserves.
Well new Karma is pretty bad right now. I would love RIOT to revert her.

Karma was a full on VGU. It is highly unlikely if not impossible for Riot to revert her. Due to high demand of change in her kit back then, Riot changed her entire kit, and introduced something new. The old kit was way unbalanced, where just pressing W on champion literally tethers them, slows them, speeds up Karma, and if an enemy doesn't get away in time, it's a snare. It's the same now, just costs more mana to do it now.

Also, the high revert we've ever had in League was Rengar and Kog'Maw with ability reverts.
